member.name: T:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeConfiguration
member.summary: The time class

member.name: M:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeConfiguration.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeConfiguration.FixedTimeStep
member.summary: A framerate-independent interval that dictates when physics calculations and FixedUpdate() events are performed.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeConfiguration.MaximumAllowedTimeStep
member.summary: A framerate-independent interval that caps the worst case scenario when frame-rate is low. Physics calculations and FixedUpdate() events will not be performed for longer time than specified.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeConfiguration.TimeScale
member.summary: The speed at which time progresses. Change this value to simulate bullet-time effects. A value of 1 means real-time. A value of .5 means half speed; a value of 2 is double speed.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeConfiguration.LogOutput
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the log output

member.name: T:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager
member.summary: Provides an interface to get time information.

member.name: M:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.Configuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the configuration

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.Clock
member.summary: Gets the value of the clock

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.DeltaTime
member.summary: The interval in seconds from the last frame to the current one (Read Only).

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.FixedDeltaTime
member.summary: The interval in seconds at which physics and other fixed frame rate updateS.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.FixedTime
member.summary: The time since the last FixedUpdate started (Read Only). This is the time in seconds since the start of the game.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.FixedTimeAsDouble
member.summary: The double precision time since the last FixedUpdate started (Read Only). This is the time in seconds since the start of the game.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.FixedUnscaledDeltaTime
member.summary: The timeScale-independent interval in seconds from the last Runtime.FixedUpdate() phase to the current one (Read Only).

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.FixedUnscaledTime
member.summary: The timeScale-independent time at the beginning of the last Runtime.FixedUpdate() phase (Read Only). This is the time in seconds since the start of the game.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.FixedUnscaledTimeAsDouble
member.summary: The double precision timeScale-independent time at the beginning of the last FixedUpdate (Read Only). This is the time in seconds since the start of the game.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.FrameCount
member.summary: The total number of frames since the start of the game (Read Only).

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.TotalFrames
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the total frames

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.AverageFrames
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the average frames

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.InFixedTimeStep
member.summary: Returns true if called inside a fixed time step callback (like Runtime FixedUpdate), otherwise returns false.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.MaximumDeltaTime
member.summary: The maximum value of TimeManager.DeltaTime in any given frame. This is a time in seconds that limits the increase of TimeManager.time between two frames.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.RealtimeSinceStartup
member.summary: The real time in seconds since the game started (Read Only).

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.RealtimeSinceStartupAsDouble
member.summary: The real time in seconds since the game started (Read Only). Double precision version of realtimeSinceStartup.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.SmoothDeltaTime
member.summary: A smoothed out TimeManager.DeltaTime (Read Only).

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.Time
member.summary: The time at the beginning of this frame (Read Only).

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.TimeAsDouble
member.summary: The double precision time at the beginning of this frame (Read Only). This is the time in seconds since the start of the game.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.TimeScale
member.summary: The scale at which time passes.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.UnscaledDeltaTime
member.summary: The timeScale-independent interval in seconds from the last frame to the current one (Read Only).

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.UnscaledTime
member.summary: The timeScale-independent time for this frame (Read Only). This is the time in seconds since the start of the game.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.UnscaledTimeAsDouble
member.summary: The double precision timeScale-independent time for this frame (Read Only). This is the time in seconds since the start of the game.

member.name: P:Alis.Core.Aspect.Time.TimeManager.IsRunning
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the is running
